events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The case has been categorized under Refund since the customer is asking to return the product and get their money back.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to assist with the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reason you'd like a refund? This will help us process your request faster.
Sure, the order number is 12345678. I want a refund because the item does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the item back using our prepaid shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label option and will send the item back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day.
